name: Quinoa Power Salad

Salad: 3 cup – Cooked Quinoa from 1 cup uncooked
1 cup – Carrots, thinly sliced or shaved

instructions: Add all the salad ingredients to a large bowl. Pour the dressing over the salad and toss to combine. Serve immediately.
Add all the dressing ingredients to a small bowl, starting with 2 tbsp of water, mix well, add water bit by bit mixing in between until the consistency is right.
Add the dressing to the salad

additional_context.tips: This is a great day 1 snack or lunch for a hike
